## IComponentDebugData.componentStats property

组件分布统计

**Signature:**

```text

        typeName&#58; string;
        instanceCount&#58; number;
        memoryPerInstance&#58; number;

        poolSize&#58; number;
        poolUtilization&#58; number;

    }>;
```
